verses.text: The \w fool|strong="H5036"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add There is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w Corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* are they, and have done \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*: \add there is\add* none that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 53.1 \ft Maschil: or, of instruction\f*

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* looked \w down|strong="H8259"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* if there \w were|strong="H3426"\w* \add any\add* that did \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*, that did \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Every one of them is gone \w back|strong="H5472"\w*: they are \w altogether|strong="H3162"\w* become \w filthy|strong="H0444"\w*; \add there is\add* none that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, no, not \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

Have the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*? who eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add as\add* they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: they have not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

There were they in \w great|strong="H6343"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*, \add where\add* no \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* was: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of him that \w encampeth|strong="H2583"\w* \add against\add* thee: thou hast put \add them\add* to \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*, because \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* them.\f + \fr 53.5 \ft were…: Heb. they feared a fear\f*

Oh \w that|strong="H5414"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were come\add* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*! When \w God|strong="H0430"\w* bringeth \w back|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, \add and\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.\f + \fr 53.6 \ft Oh that…: Heb. Who will give salvation, etc\f*
